description: From Hindi हुक़्क़ा‎ (huqqā) and Urdu حقہ‎ (huqqā), in turn, derived from Arabic حُقَّة‎ (ḥuqqa, “pot, jar”), from حُقّ‎ (ḥuqq, “cavity, hollow”).

entries.meaning: (recreational inhalants) A pipe with a long flexible tube that draws the smoke through water, traditionally used for smoking tobacco, which is often flavored.
examples: Synonyms: waterpipe, hubble-bubble, hubbly bubbly, narghile, shisha

entries.meaning: (diving) A tank-less surface air compressor pump and umbilical piping system that supplies air to a diving mask
